title: About Me
text:
I am Paul Raadnui, a masters student at the University of British Columbia. Throughout my years of studying at Penn State and working as a geophysicist at PTTEP, I have always been passionate about combining my technical foundation with a strong passion for data science and applying coding skills to solve complex geophysical problems and accelerate workflows.
I am eager to fully transition into the field of data science and hope to utilize my skills to address real-world scientific challenges and provide futuristic data-driven solutions.
For more information, please visit my Linkedin profile here: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sapol-raadnui/
